Biography_ZH: Celo 是面向现实世界打造的区块链，专注普惠金融和移动优先体验。
Biography_EN: Celo is the blockchain built for the real world.
Interview1_ZH: 今年 Celo 把重心从“移动优先支付”进一步扩展到现实世界资产和公共产品资助上，哪一个最新落地的案例最能说明这一转向？

Interview2_EN: With Ethereum L2s and stablecoin-focused chains competing for attention, how is Celo using its technical roadmap or ecosystem incentives to keep builders committed long term?
Interview3_ZH: 展望 2025 年，Celo 计划如何与 Binance 生态或更广泛的 Web3 市场展开新的合作？
Interview3_EN: Looking ahead to 2025, how will Celo collaborate with the Binance ecosystem or the broader Web3 market in new ways?

Interview1_ZH: 本次展区中，BNB Chain 重点展示的产品或解决方案想帮助哪些客户解决什么痛点？
Interview1_EN: Which customer pain points are you aiming to solve with the solutions BNB Chain is showcasing onsite this week?
Interview2_ZH: 今年以来，BNB Chain 在业务或产品上做出的哪一个关键决策，对你们的长期战略影响最大？
Interview2_EN: Since the start of this year, which key business or product decision has had the biggest impact on BNB Chain's long-term strategy?
Interview3_ZH: 展望 2025 年，BNB Chain 计划如何与 Binance 生态或更广泛的 Web3 市场展开新的合作？
Interview3_EN: Looking ahead to 2025, how will BNB Chain collaborate with the Binance ecosystem or the broader Web3 market in new ways?
